attributes.action: Raise residential property purchase price 'Stamp Duty' Land Tax levels
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The average house price in the UK is now approx £200000.
Whilst it is unlikely stamp duty will be abolished, consider raising the threasholds.
Raise each threashold by £50000.
ie:
£0-£125k to £0-£175k (0%)......
£125001-£250000 to £175001-£300000 (1%)......
£250001-£500000 to £300001-£550000  (3%)......
£500001 > to £550001 >  (4%)......

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
